name: SETIndr
description:
<>

Created for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 - You're Not alone theme.

A take on Signal games and dating simulators.

SETIndr!

Find the signal source and tune to the correct frequency with the dials

then swipe right and find your spacebae? or not...

Art by myself, audio is procedural or self recorded.

Card Mechanic from https://github.com/kiepng/Unity-SwipeableView
(MIT licence)

----

Sadly build issues meant lost time and features to hell.

Endings and Chat features lost to scriptableobject build hell. But hopefully you enjoy the idea!
